params.description: If true, area will be computed on the global sphere using the {@link https://openlayers.org/en/latest/apidoc/ol.Sphere.html#geodesicArea ol.Sphere.geodesicArea()} function. Otherwise, area will be computed on the projected plane.
params.name: options.geodesic

params.description: styles used when drawing. Specified with following properties.
params.name: options.styles

params.description: Style for mouse pointer when drawing the polygon to measure. Specified with an {@link https://openlayers.org/en/latest/apidoc/ol.style.Image.html ol.style.Image} subclass object.
params.name: options.styles.pointer

params.description: Polygon Style when drawing. Specified with an {@link https://openlayers.org/en/latest/apidoc/ol.style.Style.html ol.style.Style} object.
params.name: options.styles.start

params.description:
Polygon Style when finished drawing. Specified with an {@link https://openlayers.org/en/latest/apidoc/ol.style.Style.html ol.style.Style} object.
<!-- @param {Object} [options.tooltip = {}] - NOT YET IMPLEMENTED ! -->
params.name: options.styles.finish

params.description: Layer informations to be displayed in LayerSwitcher widget (only if a LayerSwitcher is also added to the map)
params.name: options.layerDescription

params.description: Layer title to be displayed in LayerSwitcher
params.name: options.layerDescription.title

params.description: Layer description to be displayed in LayerSwitcher
params.name: options.layerDescription.description
